lead_paragraph: While Mr. Castro, 89, seemed to take his leave of the party on Tuesday, others in his cohort signaled their intentions to stay put.

headline.print_headline: Fidel Castro Urges Party to Fulfill His Vision
headline.main: In Farewell, Fidel Castro Urges Party to Fulfill His Vision

snippet: While Mr. Castro, 89, seemed to take his leave of the party on Tuesday, others in his cohort signaled their intentions to stay put.
abstract: Former Cuban leader Fidel Castro, who is 89, bids goodbye to country's Communist Party, saying he will die soon and urging them to carry on communist mission; dramatic changes in country that are likely to follow renewal of relations with United States have some leaders worried about future of party.
